John Blizzard

Date: Saturday, 3/1/1989
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
RF Max DuBois, MR Kendrick Sims, MR Alfonso Alcantara
in return for
SP Larry Marshall.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Aldo Guerrero
Dear Sir,
Aldo Guerrero has an ERA of 3.67 at AA Maui Whalers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Raymond Stults
Dear Sir,
Raymond Stults shouldn't play at AA Maui Whalers!
He has an AVG of .216 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
